entry.title: Awesome Python Scientific Audio Updates on Jun 21, 2017
entry.content:
Audio Related Packages / Feature extraction

  • audiolazy (â­702) ğŸ™ (â­702) ğŸ“¦ - Realtime Audio Processing lib, general purpose.
  • aubio ğŸ™ (â­3.5k) ğŸ“¦ - Feature extractor, written in C, Python interface.
  • python_speech_features (â­2.4k) ğŸ™ (â­2.4k) ğŸ“¦ - Common speech features for ASR.

Audio Related Packages / Read-Write

  • audioread (â­513) ğŸ™ (â­513) ğŸ“¦ - Cross-library (GStreamer + Core Audio + MAD + FFmpeg) audio decoding.
  • pySox (â­527) ğŸ™ (â­527) ğŸ“¦ - Wrapper for sox.
  • tinytag (â­767) ğŸ™ (â­767) ğŸ“¦ - reading music meta data of MP3, OGG, FLAC and Wave files.

Audio Related Packages / Transformations - General DSP

  • AudioTK (â­252) ğŸ™ (â­252) - DSP filter toolbox (lots of filters).
  • Gammatone (â­221) ğŸ™ (â­221) - Gammatone filterbank implementation.
  • pyFFTW ğŸ™ (â­395) ğŸ“¦ - Wrapper for FFTW(3).
  • MDCT (â­53) ğŸ™ (â­53) ğŸ“¦ - MDCT transform.
  • pydub ğŸ™ (â­9.5k) ğŸ“¦ - Manipulate audio with a simple and easy high level interface.
  • pytftb ğŸ™ (â­273) - Implementation of the MATLAB Time-Frequency Toolbox.
  • PyRubberband (â­197) ğŸ™ (â­197) ğŸ“¦ - Wrapper for rubberband to do pitch-shifting and time-stretching.
  • Resampy ğŸ™ (â­271) ğŸ“¦ - Sample rate conversion.
  • STFT ğŸ™ (â­46) ğŸ“¦ - Standalone package for Short-Time Fourier Transform.

Audio Related Packages / Speech Processing

  • aeneas ğŸ™ (â­2.7k) ğŸ“¦ - Forced aligner, based on MFCC+DTW, 35+ languages.
  • pyAudioAnalysis (â­6.1k)Â² ğŸ™ (â­6.1k) ğŸ“¦ - Feature Extraction, Classification, Diarization.
  • py-webrtcvad (â­2.3k) ğŸ™ (â­2.3k) ğŸ“¦ - Interface to the WebRTC Voice Activity Detector.
  • SpeechRecognition (â­8.8k) ğŸ™ (â­8.8k) ğŸ“¦ - Wrapper for several ASR engines and APIs, online and offline.

Audio Related Packages / Music Information Retrieval

  • Catchy (â­21) ğŸ™ (â­21) - Corpus Analysis Tools for Computational Hook Discovery.
  • Madmom ğŸ™ (â­1.5k) ğŸ“¦ - MIR packages with strong focus on beat detection, onset detection and chord recognition.
  • mir_eval ğŸ™ (â­657) ğŸ“¦ - Common scores for various MIR tasks. Also includes bss_eval implementation.

Audio Related Packages / Realtime applications

  • PYO ğŸ™ (â­1.4k) - Realtime audio dsp engine.
  • python-sounddevice (â­1.1k) ğŸ™ ğŸ“¦ - PortAudio wrapper providing realtime audio I/O with NumPy.

Audio Related Packages / Audio Dataset and Dataloaders

  • beets ğŸ™ (â­14k) ğŸ“¦ - Music library manager and MusicBrainz tagger.
  • medleydb ğŸ™ (â­199) - Parse medleydb audio + annotations.
  • Soundcloud API (â­106) ğŸ™ (â­106) ğŸ“¦ - Wrapper for Soundcloud API.

Audio Related Packages / Wrappers for Audio Plugins

  • VamPy Host ğŸ“¦ - Interface compiled vamp plugins.

Tutorials / Wrappers for Audio Plugins

  • MIR Notebooks ğŸ™ (â­1.2k) - collection of instructional iPython Notebooks for music information retrieval (MIR).
  • Selected Topics in Audio Signal Processing (â­69) - Exercises as iPython notebooks.

Books / Wrappers for Audio Plugins

  • Python Data Science Handbook (â­45k) - Jake Vanderplas, Excellent Book and accompanying tutorial notebooks.
  • Fundamentals of Music Processing - Meinard MÃ¼ller, comes with Python exercises.

Scientific Papers / Wrappers for Audio Plugins

  • Python for audio signal processing - John C. Glover, Victor Lazzarini and Joseph Timoney, Linux Audio Conference 2011.
  • librosa: Audio and Music Signal Analysis in Python, Video - Brian McFee, Colin Raffel, Dawen Liang, Daniel P.W. Ellis, Matt McVicar, Eric Battenberg, Oriol Nieto, Scipy 2015.

Other Resources / Wrappers for Audio Plugins

  • Coursera Course - Audio Signal Processing, Python based course from UPF of Barcelona and Stanford University.
  • Digital Signal Processing Course - Masters Course Material (University of Rostock) with many Python examples.
  • Slack Channel - Music Information Retrieval Community.
